TopicTitle: Undocking bug .90 - Not linked to KJR?

Articles.Content:
So, im getting the bug where i can't undock anything from my station, Its been fine with docking/undocking since i built it up until the other day and i haven't installed anything new or updated anything so im unsure as to what caused this. 

I did look for a solution but after a few hours of searching all the answers pointed to KJR but i dont have that mod so whatever is causing my bug isnt related to that.

Ideas and/or advice please ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif)
